name: Henpecked
body:
### Henpecked
Is a lightweight library for Icinga passive checks. It helps you raise alerts in very easy way in your application.

### Usage
Require me!
```
require 'henpecked'
```
Config it like this! ( just point where is icinga command file! )
```
Henpecked.config do
  cmd_file "/usr/local/icinga/var/rw/icinga.cmd"
end
```

Raise alarms like this:
```
Henpecked.push(Henpecked::Alert::AcknowledgeHostProblem.new)
```

That's it folks! 
If you want to add new alert just push it!

### Custom Alerts
Just look here :)
<https://github.com/JakubOboza/henpecked/blob/master/lib/henpecked/base.rb>

### More Docs!
It is based on: <http://docs.icinga.org/latest/en/passivechecks.html>

### Support or Contact
author: jakub.oboza@gmail.com, @jakuboboza.
www: <http://no-fucking-idea.com>
